--- title: LS Bigdata School Homework 1 author: iljoon date: '2024-07-15' categories: - homework --- ### 84p ::: {#9cd780c9 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd mydata = pd.DataFrame({'제품' : ['사과', '딸기', '수박'], '가격' : [1800, 1500, 3000], '판매량' : [24, 38, 13]}) mydata ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
제품 가격 판매량
0 사과 1800 24
1 딸기 1500 38
2 수박 3000 13
``` ::: ::: ::: {#c629c494 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} price_mean = sum(mydata['가격'])/len(mydata) print('가격 평균=', price_mean) sales_mean = sum(mydata['판매량'])/len(mydata) print('판매량 평균=', sales_mean) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` 가격 평균= 2100.0 판매량 평균= 25.0 ``` ::: ::: ### 115p ::: {#91b8a197 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} raw_data = pd.read_csv('../../data/mpg.csv') raw_data.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category
0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p compact
1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p compact
2 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 20 31 p compact
3 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 auto(av) f 21 30 p compact
4 audi a4 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p compact
``` ::: ::: ::: {#60d0aaca .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} new_data = raw_data.copy() new_data = new_data.rename(columns = {'cty': 'city'}) new_data = new_data.rename(columns = {'hwy': 'hightway'}) new_data.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ### 130p ::: {#591d39fc .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} raw_midwest = pd.read_csv('../../data/midwest.csv') raw_midwest.head() raw_midwest.tail() raw_midwest.shape raw_midwest.info() raw_midwest.describe() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 437 entries, 0 to 436 Data columns (total 28 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 PID 437 non-null int64 1 county 437 non-null object 2 state 437 non-null object 3 area 437 non-null float64 4 poptotal 437 non-null int64 5 popdensity 437 non-null float64 6 popwhite 437 non-null int64 7 popblack 437 non-null int64 8 popamerindian 437 non-null int64 9 popasian 437 non-null int64 10 popother 437 non-null int64 11 percwhite 437 non-null float64 12 percblack 437 non-null float64 13 percamerindan 437 non-null float64 14 percasian 437 non-null float64 15 percother 437 non-null float64 16 popadults 437 non-null int64 17 perchsd 437 non-null float64 18 percollege 437 non-null float64 19 percprof 437 non-null float64 20 poppovertyknown 437 non-null int64 21 percpovertyknown 437 non-null float64 22 percbelowpoverty 437 non-null float64 23 percchildbelowpovert 437 non-null float64 24 percadultpoverty 437 non-null float64 25 percelderlypoverty 437 non-null float64 26 inmetro 437 non-null int64 27 category 437 non-null object dtypes: float64(15), int64(10), object(3) memory usage: 95.7+ KB ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {#6f116e3f .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} import matplotlib.pyplot as plt plt.clf() new_midwest['asian_total'] = new_midwest['asian'] / new_midwest['total'] * 100 new_midwest['asian_total'].plot.hist(rot=0) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](hw1_files/figure-html/cell-8-output-1.png){width=593 height=411} ::: ::: ::: {#a3fa7e2c .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} import numpy as np asian_total_mean = sum(new_midwest['asian_total']) / len(new_midwest) new_midwest['grade'] = np.where(new_midwest['asian_total']>asian_total_mean, 'large', 'small') ``` ::: ::: {#963a26b6 .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} my_series = new_midwest['grade'].value_counts() plt.clf() my_series.plot.bar(rot=0) plt.show() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](hw1_files/figure-html/cell-10-output-1.png){width=575 height=429} ::: :::
